com.tabuto.j2dgf.collision
Class CollisionBoundDetector

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.tabuto.j2dgf.collision.CollisionDetector
          com.tabuto.j2dgf.collision.CollisionBoundDetector
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class CollisionBoundDetector
extends CollisionDetector
implements java.io.Serializable

class CollisionBoundDetector extends CollisionDetector

This Class extends CollisionDetector to implements a Collision Boundary Detector.
Example of Use: 

 CollisionBoundDetector CBD = new CollisionBoundDetector(playersGroup, PlayFieldDimension);
 CBD.useReflection(); //Simulate an elastic collision with the boundary;
 
 CollisionManager CM = new CollisionManager();
 CM.add(CBD);

Version:
0.7.0
Author:
tabuto83
See Also:
CollisionManager, CollisionDetector, Serialized Form

Method Detail

checkCollision

public void checkCollision()
Check the position of each Sprite in the SpriteGroup registered in this CollisionDetector, if a Sprite collide with the boundary, the method calls a CollisionAction.

Overrides:
